name: Angry Choice
description:
The heroine made the wrong choice in a fit of anger and found herself in an unknown world where she was surrounded by strange creatures, and firearms became her only salvation in this dangerous world.

Angry Choice - Game with a side view, where you control a girl with a gun, fighting with monsters, which are also armed and dangerous, but no less dangerous and the world itself, which conceals traps of varying degrees of danger, challenge this mysterious world!

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Variety of levels
- Difficulty
